net.nicoulaj.benchmark.mockwebapp
Class MockWebAppServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          net.nicoulaj.benchmark.mockwebapp.MockWebAppServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class MockWebAppServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

HttpServlet that defers requests handling to a MockWebAppConfig.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Julien Nicoulaud
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

MockWebAppServlet

public MockWebAppServlet()
Method Detail

init

public void init(javax.servlet.ServletConfig config)
          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
Initialize the servlet.

Loads the mockWebAppConfig by looking up the MOCK_WEB_APP_CONF_PROPERTY as a system property or init parameter, and sets up a listener on the file changes.

Specified by:
init in interface javax.servlet.Servlet
Overrides:
init in class javax.servlet.GenericServlet
Parameters:
config - the ServletConfig, optionally with a MOCK_WEB_APP_CONF_PROPERTY parameter.
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - if the MOCK_WEB_APP_CONF_PROPERTY was neither defined as a system property nor an init parameter.

destroy

public void destroy()
Prepare the servlet for stopping service.

Disposes the config file changes monitor.

Specified by:
destroy in interface javax.servlet.Servlet
Overrides:
destroy in class javax.servlet.GenericServlet
